initial_question.title: How to get RemoteIPAddress in Asp.Net core 2.1 Service behind ocelot
initial_question.body:
## Expected Behavior / New Feature
Get User Real IP Address

## Actual Behavior / Motivation for New Feature
Get Ocelot gateway IP Address

## Steps to Reproduce the Problem

  1.Ocelot route http request to my asp.net core 2.1 service;
  2.In asp.net core 2.1 controller get remoteIPAddress from method "var ipAddress = _httpContextAccessor.HttpContext.Connection.RemoteIpAddress.ToString();"


## Specifications

  - Version:9.0.0
  - Platform:CentOS7
  - Subsystem:

satisfaction_conditions: The system must correctly obtain the original client IP address when requests pass through Ocelot gateway
The forwarded client IP information must be preserved across the request chain
The solution must work within ASP.NET Core 2.1 service architecture
The implementation must handle header forwarding between proxy layers
